sentences.sContent: Despite the title, her latest book is not so much a case for God as a case against atheism.
sentences.sContent_eng: Despite the title, her latest book is not so much a case for God as a case against atheism.
sentences.sCn: 尽管书名如此，但她最新的这本书做为反对无神论的案例并不一定是上帝要学的课程。

remMethod.val: a(无) + the(神) + ism → 无神论

words.tran: 无神论的，不信神的；无神论者的

trans.tranOther: the belief that God does not exist
